```{=html}
<script>
// åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
  const listingDiv = document.getElementById('methods-listing');
  if (!listingDiv) return;
  
  try {
    const response = await fetch('search.json');
    const data = await response.json();
    
    // ç­›é€‰æ–¹æ³•ç±»æ–‡ç« 
    const methods = data.filter(item => {
      return item.href && 
             (item.href.includes('101') || item.href.includes('102')) &&
             item.href.endsWith('.html') &&
             !item.href.includes('index') &&
             !item.href.includes('sections');
    });
    
    if (methods.length === 0) {
      listingDiv.innerHTML = '<p style="color:#6b7280;text-align:center;">è¯·å…ˆè¿è¡Œ quarto render ç”Ÿæˆæ–‡ç« </p>';
      return;
    }
    
    // å»é‡
    const seen = new Set();
    const unique = methods.filter(item => {
      if (seen.has(item.href)) return false;
      seen.add(item.href);
      return true;
    });
    
    // ç”Ÿæˆå¡ç‰‡
    let html = '<div class="article-grid">';
    unique.forEach(item => {
      html += `
        <a href="${item.href}" class="article-card">
          <div class="article-title">${item.title || 'æ–‡ç« '}</div>
          <div class="article-desc">${(item.text || '').substring(0, 80)}...</div>
        </a>
      `;
    });
    html += '</div>';
    
    listingDiv.innerHTML = html;
  } catch(e) {
    listingDiv.innerHTML = '<p style="color:#6b7280;text-align:center;">æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨å°†åœ¨ quarto render åæ˜¾ç¤º</p>';
  }
});
</script>
```
